mapper.insert: insert into p_suggestion (name, nickname, s_number, major, department, category, suggestions) values (#{name}, #{nickname},#{s_number},#{major},#{department},#{category},#{suggestions})
mapper.update: update p_suggestion set name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, s_number = #{s_number}, major = #{major}, department = #{department}, category = #{category}, suggestions = #{suggestions} where personID = #{personID}"
mapper.select: select * from p_ssugestion order by personID desc
